cards.title: Staring competition
cards.text: Have a staring competition with the person in front of you, the loser must drink

cards.title: Dance or Drink
cards.text: Do a dance or take a drink

cards.title: Youngest player drinks
cards.text: Youngest player drinks

cards.title: Skinniest jeans
cards.text: Whoever is wearing the skinniest jeans must drink

cards.title: Male longest hair
cards.text: The male with the longest hair must drink

cards.title: Tallest player
cards.text: The tallest player must stand up for one round

cards.title: Blue eyed players
cards.text: Blue eyed players drink

cards.title: Joke
cards.text: Tell a joke, if no one laughs then you must drink

cards.title: Waht
cards.text: If yuo cna raed tihs tehn dinrk

cards.title: How many countries
cards.text: Drink for how many countries you've been to

cards.title: Last Text
cards.text: Every player must read their last text out loud or drink

cards.title: Sex with more than 10 people
cards.text: Anyone who has had sex with more than 10 people must drink

cards.title: How many inches?
cards.text: Men drink for a second for every inch they have

cards.title: Biggest shoes
cards.text: The person with the biggest shoe size must drink

cards.title: Dyed hair
cards.text: Anyone with dyed hair must drink

cards.title: Redheads drink
cards.text: Redheads drink

cards.title: Nex eye contact
cards.text: The next person to make eye contact with you must drink

cards.title: Stoners drink
cards.text: Stoners drink

cards.title: No truths
cards.text: You can't tell the truth for a whole round, Drink if anyone catches you telling the truth

cards.title: You drink double
cards.text: You have to drink double for one round

cards.title: You choose - best dressed
cards.text: You choose which player is best dressed, they must drink

cards.title: Favourite book
cards.text: Tell everyone your favourite book and then drink

cards.title: Single people
cards.text: Single people drink

cards.title: KING
cards.text: command each player to do anything you want, if they cannot they must drink

cards.title: Choose a Theme
cards.text: Choose a theme. Everyone must go round and name something from that theme until someone can't, the loser must drink. For example: You choose colours and the group must go round naming colours

cards.title: Selfie and drink
cards.text: Take a selfie with the player on your right and then both drink

cards.title: If you can
cards.text: Drink if you can read this

cards.title: Player to Your Right
cards.text: Player to your right must drinks

cards.title: Pick 3
cards.text: Pick three players to drink

cards.title: DOB
cards.text: You must say the date of birth of the player ahead of you, if correct they drink, if incorrect you drink

cards.title: Slap bum
cards.text: Slap the bum of the player on your right

cards.title: You choose -nicest smile
cards.text: You choose which player has the nicest smile, they must drink

cards.title: Where and how met
cards.text: Tell everyone where and how you met the player on your left

cards.title: Bra size
cards.text: Girls drink for their bra cup size, aa=0, a=1, b=2, c=3 and so on

cards.title: Smokers drink
cards.text: Smokers drink

cards.title: Kiss right
cards.text: Kiss the player on your right or both take a drink

cards.title: Drink
cards.text: Drink

cards.title: Tilt head
cards.text: Tilt your head all the way back and take a drink

cards.title: Clockwise Dog Breeds
cards.text: Starting with you go round clockwise naming Dog Breeds, the first to repeat one or not be able to think of one must drink

cards.title: Hand on crotch
cards.text: You must keep one hand on your crotch for a round

cards.title: Smartest player
cards.text: Everyone vote who the smartest player is, they must down their drink

cards.title: Spin a bottle
cards.text: Spin a bottle and whoever it lands on must drink

cards.title: Shake hands
cards.text: Shake hands with every player

cards.title: Clockwise US presidents
cards.text: Starting with you go round clockwise naming US Presidents, the first to repeat one or not be able to think of one must drink

cards.title: Thumb war
cards.text: Have a thumb war with the player closest

cards.title: Fill it up
cards.text: Fill your drink up

cards.title: Spilt Drinks
cards.text: Any player who has spilt a drink tonight must drink

cards.title: Oldest player drinks
cards.text: Oldest player drinks
Starting with you going clockwise from 1, you can either say one, two or three numbers. for example: one, two three, four. The person who says 21 must down their drink

cards.title: Science Question
cards.text: Ask the player to the left of you a science question, if they are correct you drink, if not they drink

cards.title: Pizza or Burger
cards.text: Everyone choose which side they prefer, pizza or burgers, the smallest side must all drink

cards.title: On their phone
cards.text: Anyone on their phone right now must drink

cards.title: 10 Push ups
cards.text: Do 10 push ups, if you can't then drink

cards.title: Truth or dare
cards.text: Play Truth or Dare

cards.title: Last to raise their drink
cards.text: The last person to raise their drink must take a drink

cards.title: Look mum no hands!
cards.text: Take a drink without using your hands

cards.title: Drink Twice
cards.text: Drink twice

cards.title: Lie and drink
cards.text: Lie on your back and drink

cards.title: Touch the ceiling
cards.text: Try touch the ceiling without jumping, if you can't then you must drink

cards.title: One legged drink
cards.text: Stand on one leg and drink

cards.title: Biggest nose
cards.text: The player with the biggest nose must drink

cards.title: Bearded
cards.text: Bearded players drink

cards.title: Walk in a straight line
cards.text: Try walk in a straight line, if you fail then you must drink

cards.title: Riddles
cards.text: Tell the player on your right a riddle, if you can't think of one or they guess correctly then you must drink, if they can't figure it out they must drink

cards.title: Not drunk
cards.text: Anyone who claims they are not drunk must drink

cards.title: Favourite colour match
cards.text: Everyone say their favourite colour, any players that say the same colour must drink

cards.title: Touch your toes
cards.text: Touch your toes without bending your legs or take a drink

cards.title: Shoulder massage
cards.text: Give the player on your right a shoulder massage or drink

cards.title: Everyone drink
cards.text: Everyone drink

cards.title: Swapsies
cards.text: Swap phones with the player on your right, and then both send one text to anyone you want

cards.title: Unemployed
cards.text: Unemployed Drink

cards.title: Car brands
cards.text: Go round clockwise naming car brands, the first person not able to think of a new one must drink

cards.title: Met Today
cards.text: Any players that met today must drink

cards.title: Cats or Dogs
cards.text: Everyone vote if they prefer dogs or cats, the side with the least votes must drink

cards.title: Wearing glasses
cards.text: Everyone wearing glasses must drink

cards.title: Rock paper Scissors
cards.text: Play rock paper scissors with the player on your left, loser drinks

cards.title: 90s kids
cards.text: 90s kids drink

cards.title: Best smelling
cards.text: You must smell every player, the best smelling player must drink

cards.title: Largest ears
cards.text: The player with the largest ears must drink

cards.title: no nativo
cards.text: Drink if English isn't your native language

cards.title: Eaten during this game
cards.text: Anyone who has eaten during this game must drink

cards.title: Check your phone
cards.text: For one round if anyone checks their phone they must drink

cards.title: Most skin
cards.text: The player showing the most skin must drink

cards.title: Heads or Tails
cards.text: Choose heads or tails and then flip a coin, if correct then everyone except you drinks, if incorrect then you drink

cards.title: Past midnight
cards.text: Drink if it's past midnight

cards.title: Take a drink from left and right
cards.text: Take a drink from the player on your right and left

cards.title: Left right kiss
cards.text: The players on your right and left must kiss eachother or drink

cards.title: Draw on a player
cards.text: Draw something on a player of your choice

cards.title: Mountain
cards.text: Do something to the player on your left (for example flick them or push them) they must do that plus one more thing to the player on their left, keep going round clockwise adding steps until someone forgets one, the player who loses must drink

cards.title: Biggest fear
cards.text: Tell everyone your biggest fear and then drink

cards.title: Clockwise names
cards.text: Go round clockwise pointing at every player and saying their full names, if you can't do it then you must drink

cards.title: Formally dressed
cards.text: The most formally dressed person must drink

cards.title: Clockwise Europe Countries
cards.text: Starting with you go round clockwise naming Countries in Europe, the first to repeat one or not be able to think of one must drink

cards.title: Put ya hands up
cards.text: Everyone put their hands in the air, the last to do so must drink

cards.title: Tebahpla
cards.text: Say the alphabet backwards or drink

cards.title: Beat
cards.text: Drum a beat on the table, if the player on your right cannot repeat it they must drink

cards.title: Strange face
cards.text: Everyone make a strange face and then drink

cards.title: Most kinky
cards.text: The most kinky player must drink

cards.title: Vodka
cards.text: Anyone drinking vodka must drink

cards.title: look down look up
cards.text: Everyone look at the ground and on the count of three look up and  look at another players eyes. any players making eye ontact with eachother must drink

cards.title: left or right
cards.text: Kiss either the player on your left or right, you choose...

cards.title: Only Whisper
cards.text: You must only whisper until your next turn

cards.title: Push left
cards.text: Push the player on your left

cards.title: Forehead kiss
cards.text: Kiss the closest player to you on the forehead

cards.title: Card of Death
cards.text: Down your drink and then take a shot

cards.title: Beer drinkers
cards.text: Anyone drinking beer must drink

cards.title: The floor is lava
cards.text: Anyone who touches the floor for one round must drink

cards.title: Vegetarians
cards.text: Vegetarians drink

cards.title: Good or bad joke
cards.text: The player on your right must tell you a joke, you must decide if it's good enough, if it's not they must drink

cards.title: 2 truths 1 lie
cards.text: Tell everyone two truths and one lie Every player must guess which one is a lie Every player that gets it wrong must drink

cards.title: Arm Wrestle
cards.text: Have an arm wrestle with the player on your right, the loser must down their drink

cards.title: Biggest...
cards.text: The player with the biggest hands must take a drink

cards.title: Eyes closed
cards.text: Play this round with your eyes closed

cards.title: Fists of five
cards.text: On the count of three, all players must show a number on their hand from one to five, any players with the same number must drink

cards.title: Clockwise US States
cards.text: Starting with you go round clockwise naming US States, the first to repeat one or not be able to think of one must drink

cards.title: Isn't straight
cards.text: Anyone who isn't straight must drink

cards.title: Fingers pointing
cards.text: Everyone point at a player, the player with the most fingers pointed at them must drink

cards.title: Dance Dance Dance
cards.text: Dance until your next round or down your drink

cards.title: Same drink
cards.text: All players with the same drink as you must drink

cards.title: Green eyed players
cards.text: Green eyed players drink

cards.title: Drink Something New
cards.text: Drink something you haven't drunk today

cards.title: Take a drink
cards.text: Take a drink

cards.title: Favourite movies
cards.text: You and the player on your right say your favourite movies, the rest of the players vote which movie is worst, the player with the most votes must drink

cards.title: Kiss as many players as you want
cards.text: Kiss as many players as you want, drink for the number of players you don't kiss

cards.title: Clockwise countries in Asia
cards.text: Starting with you go round clockwise naming Countries in Asia, the first to repeat one or not be able to think of one must drink

cards.title: Lipstick kiss
cards.text: Anyone wearing lipstick must drink, and kiss someone on the cheek

cards.title: Compliment me!
cards.text: Everyone must compliment you or drink

cards.title: Down your drink
cards.text: Down your drink

cards.title: Mexican Wave
cards.text: Take a drink and then the player on your left must take a drink and then the player on their right and then so on until it is back to you

cards.title: Closed eyes guess
cards.text: Close your eyes and the player on your left must give you a secret drink, if you can guess the drink correctly then they must drink if not then you must drink

cards.title: Clockwise Fruit
cards.text: Starting with you go round clockwise naming Fruit, the first to repeat one or not be able to think of one must drink

cards.title: Weakest drink
cards.text: The player with the weakest drink must take a drink

cards.title: Clockwise Beatles Songs
cards.text: Starting with you go round clockwise naming Beatels Songs, the first to repeat one or not be able to think of one must drink

cards.title: Swap Clothes
cards.text: Swap a piece of clothing with the player in front of you

cards.title: Compliment Left
cards.text: Compliment the person on your left

cards.title: Whoever left last
cards.text: Whoever left the room last must take a drink

cards.title: Mixed drink
cards.text: If your drink is mixed then take a drink

cards.title: Take of ya clothes
cards.text: Choose a player to remove a piece of clothing

cards.title: Anyone with a job
cards.text: Anyone with a job must drink

cards.title: Players with tattoos drink
cards.text: Players with tattoos drink

cards.title: General knowledge question
cards.text: Ask the player on your right a general knowledge question, if they are correct then you drink, but if they are wrong they must drink

cards.title: Everyone down!
cards.text: Everyone down their drinks

cards.title: Can't stop until you stop
cards.text: All players start drinking and can't stop until you stop

cards.title: Player you've known the longest
cards.text: The player you have known the longest must drink

cards.title: Left only
cards.text: Use only your left hand for one round

cards.title: Never have I ever
cards.text: Play one round of never have I ever

cards.title: Ignore me
cards.text: Everyone ignore this player for one round

cards.title: Piercing
cards.text: Drink if you have a piercing

cards.title: Another player's drink
cards.text: Pick another player's drink and take a drink from it

cards.title: Touch the floor
cards.text: Everyone must touch the floor, the last to do so must drink

cards.title: If you would...
cards.text: If you would have sex with another player take a drink

cards.title: Say cheers
cards.text: Everyone raise their drinks and say cheers

cards.title: Capital cities
cards.text: Starting with you go round clockwise naming capital cities, the first to repeat one of not be able to think of one must drink

cards.title: Quote a movie
cards.text: Quote a movie, if the player on your left cannot guess the move they must drink

cards.title: Clockwise natural disasters
cards.text: Starting with you go round clockwise naming types of natural disaster, the first to repeat one or not be able to think of one must drink

cards.title: Most sober vote
cards.text: Everyone vote who the most sober player is, they must down their drink

cards.title: Single people
cards.text: All single people must drink

cards.title: Choose someone to down
cards.text: Choose someone to down their drink

cards.title: Everyone phone me!
cards.text: Everyone must try to phone this player, the first to succeed can choose someone to drink

cards.title: The next player who wants to leave
cards.text: The next player who wants to leave the room must finish their drink

cards.title: One syllable name
cards.text: Anyone with a one syllable name must drink

cards.title: Drink with me
cards.text: Pick a payer to drink with you

cards.title: Picture taken
cards.text: Everyone who has taken a picture tonight must take a drink

cards.title: You choose - Nicest eyes
cards.text: You choose which player has the nicest eyes, they must drink

cards.title: Rhyme
cards.text: Choose a word and then everyone must go round clockwise saying words that rhyme with that word, the first one to fail must drink

cards.title: Insult infront
cards.text: Insult the player in front of you

cards.title: Take player right drink
cards.text: Take some of the drink from the player on your right and pour it into your drink

cards.title: Apple owners
cards.text: Anyone who owns an apple product must drink

cards.title: Last card memory
cards.text: Drink if you can't remember your last card

cards.title: Clothes off or drink
cards.text: Take off a piece of clothing or drink

cards.title: Pick a side: tea or coffee
cards.text: Everyone choose which side they prefer, tea or coffee, the smallest side must all drink

cards.title: I love you, passionately
cards.text: Tell the player on your left that you love them, passionately

cards.title: One leg
cards.text: Everyone stand on one leg, the first to fall must drink

cards.title: Hold hands with your left
cards.text: You must hold hands with the player on your left for one round

cards.title: Would you rather
cards.text: Play would you rather

cards.title: Animal noise
cards.text: Every player must make an animal noise and then take a drink

cards.title: 3 adjectives
cards.text: Pick 3 adjectives to describe the person on your left and then both drink

cards.title: Religious
cards.text: Anyone religious drink

cards.title: 6 months single
cards.text: Drink if you have been single for 6 months or more

cards.title: more Females or males
cards.text: If there are more females and males then females must drink, if there are more males than females then males must drink

cards.title: Go find something
cards.text: The player on your right must find something and bring it to you as a gift

cards.title: Drunkest player
cards.text: The drunkest player must take another drink

cards.title: Player with the most cash
cards.text: The player with the most cash on them must drink

cards.title: Someone elses drink
cards.text: If you are drinking someone elses drink, or someone paid for your drink, Thank them and take a drink

cards.title: Just drink
cards.text: just drink

cards.title: Hug
cards.text: Hug any player

cards.title: Vegans drink
cards.text: Vegans drink

cards.title: Drink Race
cards.text: Race the player across from you to finish a drink, the loser must take another drink

cards.title: Most countries
cards.text: Whoever has travelled to the most countries must drink

cards.title: Clockwise movie genres
cards.text: Starting with you go round clockwise naming movie genres, the first to repeat one or not be able to think of one must drink

cards.title: Born in summer
cards.text: Anyone born in summer drink

cards.title: Banned Word
cards.text: You can pick a word that is banned for two rounds, if anyone says this word they must drink
Think of a number from 1-10, the other players must go clockwise guessing the number, whoever gets ir correct can choose someone to drink

cards.title: Take off ya clothes
cards.text: Take off a piece of clothing or drink

cards.title: Athiests
cards.text: Athiests drink

cards.title: High five
cards.text: High five the player to your right and then both take a drink

cards.title: Name the Song
cards.text: If you can name the song playing right now choose someone to drink, if there is no music then you must drink

cards.title: 2 player kiss
cards.text: Pick two players, they have to kiss eachother or both take a drink

cards.title: Truth or lie
cards.text: Say a statement about yourself, it can be a truth or lie, the other players must colectively decide if it's a truth or a lie. If they are incorrect they must drink, but if they are correct you must drink

cards.title: Dog owners drink
cards.text: Dog owners drink

cards.title: Straightest teeth
cards.text: The player with the straightest teeth must drink

cards.title: Brunettes Drink
cards.text: Brunettes drink

cards.title: Player to your left
cards.text: The player left of you must drink

cards.title: Looking at this card
cards.text: Everyone looking at this card must drink

cards.title: Opposite sex swap
cards.text: Swap a piece of clothing with the closest player of the opposite sex

cards.title: Fill and Down
cards.text: Fill up your cup and then down it

cards.title: Opposite Player
cards.text: The player opposite you must drink

cards.title: Born in winter
cards.text: Anyone born in winter drink

cards.title: 10 seconds
cards.text: Finish your drink in under 10 seconds, if you fail then finish that drink and one more

cards.title: All players must touch you
cards.text: All players must touch you, the last to do so must drink

cards.title: Every letter drink
cards.text: Drink for every letter in your name

cards.title: Favourite Hobby
cards.text: Tell everyone your favourite hobby then drink

cards.title: judge
cards.text: Everyone must dance for you, you can choose who does the worst dance and they must drink

cards.title: Brown eyed players
cards.text: Brown eyed players drink

cards.title: Gestures
cards.text: Make a gesture, the player to the left of you must make that gesture and make another one, keep going round clockwise adding gestures until someone forgets one, the player who forgets one must drink

cards.title: Best haircut
cards.text: Everyone vote who has the best haircut, the player with the most votes must take a drink

cards.title: make out
cards.text: Pick a player and make out with them

cards.title: Makeup
cards.text: Any players wearing makeup must drink

cards.title: Blondes Drink
cards.text: Blondes drink

cards.title: Everyone but you and me
cards.text: Choose a player, everyone but you and that player must drink

cards.title: Clockwise music genres
cards.text: Starting with you go round clockwise naming music genres, the first to repeat one or not be able to think of one must drink

cards.title: Ever kissed??
cards.text: If you've ever kissed one of the other players then you must drink

cards.title: Look alike
cards.text: Choose which two players look the most alike, they  must both drink

cards.title: Shortest player
cards.text: The shortest player must sit on the floor for one round

cards.title: Fuck
cards.text: You cannot swear for 3 rounds. If you swear then you must drink

cards.title: Hairiest
cards.text: hairiest player drinks

cards.title: Tell them
cards.text: Call someone and tell them you love them

cards.title: Touch a wall
cards.text: Everyone must touch a wall, the last person to do so must drink

cards.title: Pale
cards.text: The most pale player must drink

cards.title: Cat owners drink
cards.text: Cat owners drink

cards.title: Guilty pleasure
cards.text: say your guilty pleasure

cards.title: Boulder
cards.text: you must drink once, and then the player to your left must drink twice, and then the player to their left three times and so on until it comes back to you

cards.title: Wine drinkers drink
cards.text: Wine drinkers drink

cards.title: Seeing double
cards.text: Everyone must drink double for one round

cards.title: Still as a statue
cards.text: Stay completely still like a statue for one round

cards.title: Cried this month
cards.text: Anyone who has cried in the last month must drink in sorrow

cards.title: Question Master
cards.text: For one round if anyone answers a question asked by you they must drink

cards.title: Best looking player
cards.text: Everyone vote who the best looking player is, they must down their drink

cards.title: Girl shortest hair
cards.text: The girl with the shortest hair must drink

cards.title: Every sibling
cards.text: Drink for every sibling you have

cards.title: Me no english
cards.text: You must not speak English for one round

cards.title: First drunk pirate
cards.text: If this is your first time playing drunk pirate you must drink

cards.title: Been in a fight
cards.text: Drink if you've ever been in a fight

cards.title: Sill walk
cards.text: Everyone must do a silly walk and then drink

cards.title: Females drink
cards.text: Females drink

cards.title: Longest hair
cards.text: The player with the longest hair must drink

cards.title: Pick a side: red or blue
cards.text: Everyone choose which side they prefer, Red or Blue, the smallest side must all drink

cards.title: Clockwise Currencies
cards.text: Starting with you go round clockwise naming different currencies, the first to repeat one or not be able to think of one must drink

cards.title: Everyone stand up
cards.text: Everyone stand up, the last person standing must drink

cards.title: Do it
cards.text: Do whatever the player on your left wants, if you can't then drink

cards.title: Offer me a drink
cards.text: Everyone must offer you a drink, you can choose one and take a drink from it

cards.title: Hum a song
cards.text: Hum a song, the first player to guess the song can choose someone to drink

cards.title: Drink Three Times
cards.text: Drink three times

cards.title: Most buff
cards.text: Most buff player must drink

cards.title: Males drink
cards.text: Males drink

cards.title: Flex and drink
cards.text: Flex and drink

cards.title: Enjoy the taste
cards.text: If you enjoy the taste of your drink, then take a drink

cards.title: Clockwise Compliment
cards.text: Starting with you, go round clockwise complimenting eachother

cards.title: Been sick while drinking
cards.text: Anyone who has been sick while drinking must drink

cards.title: Can play an instrument
cards.text: Anyone who can play an instrument drink

cards.title: Drink from every player
cards.text: Take a drink form every players drink

cards.title: Best Friend
cards.text: If your best friend is playing then you must both drink

cards.title: Silent
cards.text: Stay silent for one round or drink

cards.title: Turn away and touch shoulder
cards.text: Turn away from the other players and then one player has to tap your shoulder, if you guess who it was correctly everyone else drinks but if you are wrong you must drink

cards.title: Pass to the left
cards.text: Everyone pass their drink to their left and let them take a drink
